title: Apple Introduces New AirPods Pro Charging Case and EarPods With USB-C
content:
In addition to the iPhone 15 models getting a USB-C port, Apple today announced that the second-generation AirPods Pro will now be available with a USB-C charging case, and the wired EarPods are getting a USB-C connector too.


Apple said the second-generation AirPods Pro will now ship with a USB-C case, and it will be sold separately.
Tag: September 2023 Apple Event

This article, "Apple Introduces New AirPods Pro Charging Case and EarPods With USB-C" first appeared on MacRumors.com
